S03bsa032_u:4694: ko hi pratyupakārārthī tasya bhūyaḥ kariṣyati //
S03bsa032_u:4695: Jm_34.18 upakartā tu dharmeṇa paratastatphalena ca /
S03bsa032_u:4699: Jm_34.20 upakṛtaṃ kila vetti na me parastadapakāramiti prakaroti yaḥ /
S03bsa032_u:4700: nanu viśodhya guṇaiḥ sa yaśastanuṃ dviradavṛttimabhipratipadyate //
S03bsa032_u:4701: Jm_34.21 na vetti cedupakṛtamāturaḥ paro na yokṣyate 'pi sa guṇakāntayā śriyā /
S03bsa032_u:4702: sacetasaḥ punaratha ko bhavetkramaḥ samucchritaṃ pramathitumātmano yaśaḥ //
S03bsa032_u:4704: Jm_34.22 yasmin sādhūpacīrṇe 'pi mitradharmo na lakṣyate /
S03bsa032_u:4706: atha sā devatā tatsubhāṣitaprasāditamanāḥ sādhu sādhviti punaruktamabhipraśasya tattatpriyamuvāca -
S03bsa032_u:4708: na veṣamātraṃ hi munitvasiddhaye guṇairupetastviha tattvato muniḥ //
S03bsa032_u:4710: tadevaṃ protsāhyamāno 'pi sādhurnālaṃ pāpe pravartitumanabhyāsāditi sajjanapraśaṃsāyāṃ vācyam /
S03bsa032_u:4711: evaṃ kṣāntikathāyāmapyupaneyam - evaṃ kṣamāparicayānna vairabahulo bhavati,
S03bsa032_u:4713: evaṃ pratisaṃkhyānabahulāḥ svāṃ guṇaśobhāmanurakṣanti paṇḍitā iti pratisaṃkhyānavarṇe vācyam /
S03bsa032_u:4714: tathāgatamāhātmye ca bhadraprakṛtyabhyāsavarṇe ca - evaṃ bhadraprakṛtirabhyastā tiryaggatānāmapi na nivartata iti /
